transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji good evening sir main Aishwarya baat kar raha tha India Mart se senior management kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir aapki Pooja se baat hui hogi usne connect kiya tha mere ko aapko senior se baat hui hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha wo theek hai.
Executive: Haan haan wo mujhe na actually madam ne aapko bata diya hoga.
Executive: Matlab mere ko usne brief kar diya hai that you are seeking for refund aapki koi aur bhi company hai India Mart pe sahi.
Customer: Actually sir main aapko completely batata hu I am not asking for a proper refund hai na agar aap you can switch the account then you can also free for switch the account okay agar aap usko haan ji.
Executive: Exactly kya chahiye wo batao aap jo bata rahe hain na wo main feasibility check karta hu exactly abhi aap jo bata rahe ho.
Customer: Haan main wohi keh raha hu ki mere mere yaha pe aapke India Mart pe do account hai ek Tripundram ke naam se ek Rudram ke naam se Tripundram wala jo account hai wo LLP tha okay to LLP mein haan partner tha to wo bhi humne close karwa diya hai actually kuch disputes hue the to wo humne LLP close karwa diya hai achcha wo account mera kabhi purana gaya hai approx 8 saal ka uska exposure hai India Mart pe.
Executive: Okay aur uske wajah se fir maine proprietor mein naya account open karwaya hai lekin iska exposure ka dhyan na maine diya na field wale ne kisi ne bataya aur jabki unko purane account ka pata tha but unhone bhi koi suggestion nahi diya ab main jab deal leta hu to trust ka problem kafi jyada aata hai ki naya account hai jaldi koi client trust nahi kar raha hai actually main ye soch raha tha ki mera ye wala account close karke uska jo amount hai usko waha pe refund karwa dijiye usko wahi ke wahi pe karwa dijiye taki ye ho jaye ki aap jo mera refund ki bhi na ho aur wo ye account close hoke dusra wala start ho jaye.
Executive: Ye account close karunga us wale pe isko transfer karunga to uske liye mujhe Tripundram ka bhi GST cancel chahiye wo jab tak active hai tab tak to main kuch nahi kar sakta.
Customer: Ye cancel to ho chuka hai na maine iska mail hai mere paas.
Executive: Wo abhi bhi us pe portal pe to active dikha raha hai pehli cheez GST wale.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: GST portal pe wo abhi bhi active dikha raha hai.
Customer: Nahi update nahi hua wo actually mail hai mere paas cancel ka main aapko send kar deta hu.
Executive: Wo theek hai ho sakta hai wo kuch dino mein ho jaye wo shayad waha update nahi kiya hoga.
Customer: Shayad bhi update update nahi kiya hoga unhone.
Executive: Shayad bhi kuch nahi hoga abhi char panch din mein.
Customer: Jo bhi hai.
Executive: Haan haan theek hai main ab wo wo keval primary nahi hai na mere liye ab maan lijiye main ye maan ke chalta hu ki wo ho gaya cancel maan lete hain scenario mein theek hai ab wo cancel ho gaya hai GST ab aap ye chah rahe ho ki main is wale account ko kar du band theek hai aur is wale account ki ka jo GST hai wo main waha update kar du right ab mere ko ek cheez aur bataye us Tripundram wale account pe jo primary mobile number hai ye kiska hai 304 wala?
Customer: Mera hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur ye 649 wala jo dusra hai wo dono mere hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi dono mere hi hai partner wo primary maine rakha hua tha apne paas hi actually wo 60 60 40 wala case tha na.
Executive: Theek hai ek cheez aur Tripundram wala jo account hai ye aapne iska free account create kiya tha 7 saal pehle ya 7 saal pehle paid account tha wo.
Customer: Nahi free tha paid nahi tha us time pe.
Executive: Hain? Haan paid nahi tha free tha.
Customer: Free tha.
Executive: Paid nahi tha paid to abhi kiya tha theek hai aur Tripundram wala account paid kab se hua hai last year se okay to matlab 6 saal wo free account hi tha.
Customer: Last year se hua hai.
Executive: Theek hai matlab initially 6 saal wo free account mein tha aur Tripundram ka bhi jo GST hai wo 2023 mein bana hai haan uske baad fir wo paid hua hai to matlab GST bhi aapne Tripundram wale account mein abhi jab last year paid hua hai tabhi wo GST add karaya hoga usse pehle wo GST bhi added nahi hoga right.
Customer: Haan haan wo to ek sath hi hua tha sara open bhi hua tha add bhi hua tha sab kuch sath mein hua tha maine start kiya tha.
Executive: Samajh gaya aapki baat to ki scenario kya hoga na jo cheez exactly aap chah rahe ho ki main account ko band kar du is wale ko aur main is account ki detail usi account pe overcome kar du to agar main is account ki detail us account pe overcome kar bhi dunga right to bhi fact sheet details mein automatically aapka jo waha 7 years likha aa raha hai wo change ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi wo to account ka aa raha hai na.
Executive: Wo account wo to mobile number ka aa raha hai jis mobile number se maine login kiya hai us mobile number ka particular aa raha hai bilkul usme aisa nahi aa raha hai ki maine jab se subscription liya hai tab se aa raha hai jab se wo account bana hai wo chahe paid ho chahe non paid ho hai na haan jab se jab se main India Mart pe haan jab se main India Mart pe live hua aapne pehli baar account create kiya hoga na jisme aapne company ka naam likh diya hoga ya kuch bhi details initially wo tab se capture kar raha hai 7 years se right ab agar main is wale account ko band karke waha jaunga us wale mein add on karunga to wo anyway 7 year ka jo issue hai na wo fir bhi ab ek cheez aur bataye ye dusre wale account mein koi bada package bhi lena hai aisa bhi kuch hai kya lena hai bada package bhi kuch lena hai aisa bhi kuch bataya gaya hai bada package matlab koi bada plan lena hai koi aur service leni hai aisa bhi kuch hai concept.
Customer: Nahi uska to aisa kuch nahi hai wo to yahi wala jo hai ye isi ko mujhe upgrade karwana hai matlab ye wala regular chalega mera ye jo mera second wala bataya hai maine use agar hum isme kar dete hain to wo regular chalega wo regularly chalega aur renew bhi hota rahega aur regular chalta rahega lekin wo exposure ho payega to hi ho payega ye main do saal wale mein nahi kar paunga do saal wale mein kabhi problem ho rahi hai to actually discussion karne ke baad hi humne decision liya hua hai wo do din se isi cheez pe discuss kar rahe hain.
Executive: Samajh gaya aapki baat.
Customer: Last mein jo over kam aaya hai wo yahi aaya hua hai ki isko hume switch karwana padega to hi kam chal payega warna wo fees bhi bekar hai meri taraf se samajh rahe ho.
Executive: Theek hai mere ko ek baar na ye jo meri team hai unse confirm karna padega kyunki ek baar ye bhi cheez check karna padega.
Customer: Main moto aap na refund ka mat rakho usme refund ka main moto nahi hai main moto bas khali switch switch ka hai baki ye continue chalana hai mujhe.
Executive: Main wo perfectly fine wo refund ka moto nahi hai wo point samajh gaya aapka but just point is na ki pehla to mere paas refund policy waise bhi nahi hai dusra jo switch ki concept hai na wo switch ka concept aapko jis reason ki wajah se chahiye wo main kar paunga nahi kar paunga us pe mujhe aapko concrete answer dena hai char logo se us puch kar koi resolution pata karke kyunki directly aap as a mujhe directly bol do aur main aapko ye kahu ki acha ye aise kyunki iska process to ye hai ki Rudram wala close karo download karo account band karo aur Rudram wale ka paisa aapko wapis kar do aur Tripundram wale se aap usko jab close aap dikhi jayega to Tripundram wale pe Rudram wale ka jo GST hai wo add karao aur usko aap continue karo process to ye hai ab ye kaise ho sakta hai ho sakta hai nahi ho sakta hai kal tak ka samay dijiye final batata hu.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur isme kuch update ka kuch aa raha tha ki aaj hi aaj kar sakte hain khali aaj ke baad update nahi hoga ye Rudram wala.
Customer: Haan ji wo Tripundram wala Tripundram wala ye batane chahta ki aaj aaj ka hi din hai aaj agar usko start karwate ho to ho jayega warna aage uske baad next usse update nahi ho payega wo aisa kuch hai ki renew bhi agar karwate hain ya fir koi process karwate hain to aaj aaj ka.
Executive: Usme kal tak ka samay hai kal tak ka hai.
Customer: Kal tak ka hai is mahine tak rehta hai na kyunki Tripundram wala aapka November ka renewal hai na to is mahine tak rehta hai to usme kal tak ka samay hai don't worry.
Executive: Achcha theek hai chaliye mujhe aap bataiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close one account and transfer amount.

- Wants to switch accounts due to trust issues.

- Wants to update GST information.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the standard account closure process.

- Executive will check feasibility of account switch.

- Executive will provide a concrete answer by tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with a resolution tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account closure, account switch, gst, refund, trust issues
